definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: Please return the form, duly completed and signed, to our Public Office.
sentences.chinese: 请于填妥及签署表格后将其交回卓佳投资者服务处。

sentences.english: Alternatively, you may ask the Clerk for an Execution form?
sentences.chinese: 或者，你可以问书记官要一份执行表格。

sentences.english: Or you can have a form to collect visitors' comments about your site.
sentences.chinese: 或者可以创建表格收集访问者对网站的评论。

sentences.english: I've filled in this form incorrectly. Can I have another blank?
sentences.chinese: 这张表我填错了，能否再给我一张空白表格？

sentences.english: To avoid duplication, please do not mail faxed order form.
sentences.chinese: 已传真表格，毋须再邮寄，以免重复。

sentences.english: You can do this by joining the tables and merging the information between them.
sentences.chinese: 您可以联系表格，并合并表格中的信息来完成这一点。

sentences.english: You can do this by joining the tables and merging the information between them.
sentences.chinese: 您可以联系表格，并合并表格中的信息来完成这一点。

sentences.english: A two-dimensional, or 2D, array stores elements in a grid-like fashion.
sentences.chinese: 二维数组存储类似表格形式的数据元素。

sentences.english: Please use additional sheet on Part B4 if required.
sentences.chinese: 如表格空位不够，请加B4段表格填写。

sentences.english: Please use additional sheet on Part B4 if required.
sentences.chinese: 如表格空位不够，请加B4段表格填写。

sentences.english: Fill out each box on the form on a 1-5 scale.
sentences.chinese: 按照一到五的等级来填写表格。

sentences.english: Fill out the form and follow the instructions to activate your account.
sentences.chinese: 按要求填写表格，并激活自己的帐号。

sentences.english: Put the request form and check in a separate sealed bad to keep them dry.
sentences.chinese: 把所填写的表格单独入与一个自封袋中，保证其干净。

sentences.english: These charts do not include counts of deserters , those convicted or executed, etc.
sentences.chinese: 这些表格尚不包括逃兵，被宣判及被处决的人，等等。

sentences.english: Please x your ideas in the little boxes on the form.
sentences.chinese: 请用x号在表格上的小方格内标出您的意见。

sentences.english: If you have any problem(s) filling in this form, please contact your account opening branch.
sentences.chinese: 如于填写本表格时有任何疑问，请向开户分行查询。

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
